body_html:
Thanks so much! (I'll learn some cmake before posting any more compilation errors...).
This made it for my system configuration. #675 helped.

export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/usr
export CUDA_HOME=/usr
export CUDA_LIB=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
CC=gcc-5 CXX=g++-5 python setup.py install

body:
Thanks so much! (I'll learn some cmake before posting any more compilation errors...).
This made it for my system configuration. #675 helped.
```
export CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/usr
export CUDA_HOME=/usr
export CUDA_LIB=/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu
CC=gcc-5 CXX=g++-5 python setup.py install
```
